info.name: Bloomzon Project
info.description:
# **API ‚Äì Internal Documentation**

This collection contains the **internal API resources** used in the Bloomzon project.

It serves as a reference for team members to:

- üìÇ Understand the **available resources** and their purpose.
    
- ‚öôÔ∏è See how specific **endpoints work** (inputs, outputs, examples).
    
- üß≠ Navigate the project and know **what a certain activity does**.
    
- ü§ù Collaborate consistently across the backend and frontend.
    

Use this collection to explore, test, and document endpoints as the project evolves.

[Learn more about Postman Collections.](https://learning.postman.com/docs/collections/collections-overview/)

request.description:
This is a POST request, submitting data to an API via the request body. This request submits JSON data, and the data is reflected in the response.

A successful POST request typically returns a `200 OK` or `201 Created` response code.

item.name: Categories
Main Category

request.description: This endpoint enables you to add a new main category
This endpoint allows you to update the details of an existing main category by its ID
This endpoint deletes an existing main category by its ID.

item.description:
### Description

Represents the highest-level grouping of products (e.g., _Electronics, Fashion, Groceries_).

item.name: Category

request.description: This endpoint enables you to add a new category under a specific main category
This endpoint allows you to update the details of an existing category by its ID.
This endpoint deletes an existing category by its ID

item.description:
### Description

A **Category** is a subdivision under a Main Category that organizes products into more specific groups (e.g., _Mobile Phones, Laptops_ under _Electronics_).

item.name: Sub Category

request.description: This endpoint enables you to add a new subcategory under a specific category.
This endpoint allows you to update the details of an existing subcategory by its ID.
This endpoint deletes an existing subcategory by its ID

item.description:
### Description

A **Subcategory** is a further breakdown of a Category into narrower product groups (e.g., _Android Phones, iPhones_ under _Mobile Phones_).

The **Categories** section organizes products into a hierarchical structure for easy navigation and filtering.

- **Main Category** represent the highest level (e.g., _Electronics, Fashion, Groceries_).
    
- **Category** sit under a main category to provide more specific grouping (e.g., _Mobile Phones, Laptops_ under _Electronics_).
    
- **Subcategory** further refine categories into narrower groups (e.g., _Android Phones, iPhones_ under _Mobile Phones_).
    

This structure helps customers browse products efficiently and enables sellers to manage inventory within a well-defined taxonomy.
